df-mhm
blocks.content: A monoid homomorphism is a function on the base sets which preserves the binary operation and the identity. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-mhm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(cmhm, cmpo(s0, s1, cmnd, cmnd, crab(s2, co(cfv(cbs, cv(s1)), cmap, cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), wa(wral(s3, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wral(s4, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), co(cv(s3), cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), cv(s4))), co(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3)), cfv(cplusg, cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s2), cv(s4)))))), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), cfv(c0g, cv(s0))), cfv(c0g, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-mhm(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ⊢ MndHom =(s0 ∈ Mnd, s1 ∈ Mnd ↦ { s2 ∈((Base ` s1)[↦](Base ` s0))|(∀(s3 ∈(Base ` s0), ∀(s4 ∈(Base ` s0),(s2 `(s3[(+ ` s0)]s4))=((s2 ` s3)[(+ ` s1)](s2 ` s4))))∧(s2 `(0 ` s0))=(0 ` s1))})
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
}

blocks.name: df-submnd
blocks.content: A submonoid is a subset of a monoid which contains the identity and is closed under the operation. Such subsets are themselves monoids with the same identity. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-submnd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(csubmnd, cmpt(s0, cmnd, crab(s1, cpw(cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cfv(c0g, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), wral(s2, cv(s1), wral(s3, cv(s1), wcel(co(cv(s2), cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), cv(s3)), cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-submnd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ⊢ SubMnd =(s0 ∈ Mnd ↦ { s1 ∈ P((Base ` s0))|((0 ` s0)∈ s1 ∧ ∀(s2 ∈ s1, ∀(s3 ∈ s1,(s2[(+ ` s0)]s3)∈ s1)))})
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: mhmrcl1
blocks.content: Reverse closure of a monoid homomorphism. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mhmrcl1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmhm, c2)), wcel(c1, cmnd))
} = {

  simprbi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmhm, c2)), w3a(wf(c0, c4, cfv(cbs, c2)), wral(hs0, c4, wral(hs1, c4, wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c7, cfv(c0, cv(hs1)))))), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c0g, c1)), cfv(c0g, c2))), wa(wcel(c1, cmnd), wcel(c2, cmnd)))

  eqeq12d(cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), c6, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c7, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), cfv(c0, co(c3, c6, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, c3), c7, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))

  fveq2(cv(hs0), c3, c0)
  eqeq12d(cfv(c0, co(c3, c6, cv(hs1))), co(cfv(c0, c3), c7, cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), cfv(c0, co(c3, c6, c5)), co(cfv(c0, c3), c7, cfv(c0, c5)), wceq(cv(hs1), c5))
  fveq2d(c0, co(c3, c6, cv(hs1)), co(c3, c6, c5), wceq(cv(hs1), c5))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c5, c3, c6)

thm mhmlin(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(c1[MndHom]c2)∧ c3 ∈ c4 ∧ c5 ∈ c4)→(c0 `(c3[c6]c5))=((c0 ` c3)[c7](c0 ` c5)))
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c1)
  ⊣ c6 =(+ ` c1)
  ⊣ c7 =(+ ` c2)
} = {
  3impib(c0 ∈(c1[MndHom]c2), c3 ∈ c4, c5 ∈ c4, (c0 `(c3[c6]c5))=((c0 ` c3)[c7](c0 ` c5)))
  syl5com(c0 ∈(c1[MndHom]c2), (c3 ∈ c4 ∧ c5 ∈ c4), (c0 `(c3[c6]c5))=((c0 ` c3)[c7](c0 ` c5)), ∀(hs0 ∈ c4, ∀(hs1 ∈ c4,(c0 `(hs0[c6]hs1))=((c0 ` hs0)[c7](c0 ` hs1)))))
  simp2d(c0 ∈(c1[MndHom]c2), ∀(hs0 ∈ c4, ∀(hs1 ∈ c4,(c0 `(hs0[c6]hs1))=((c0 ` hs0)[c7](c0 ` hs1)))), (c0 : c4 →(Base ` c2)), (c0 `(0 ` c1))=(0 ` c2))
  simprbi(c0 ∈(c1[MndHom]c2), ((c0 : c4 →(Base ` c2))∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c4, ∀(hs1 ∈ c4,(c0 `(hs0[c6]hs1))=((c0 ` hs0)[c7](c0 ` hs1))))∧(c0 `(0 ` c1))=(0 ` c2)), (c1 ∈ Mnd ∧ c2 ∈ Mnd))
  ismhm(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c4, (Base ` c2), c6, c7, (0 ` c1), (0 ` c2))
  eqid((Base ` c2))
  eqid((0 ` c1))
  eqid((0 ` c2))

  eqeq12d((c0 `(hs0[c6]hs1)), ((c0 ` hs0)[c7](c0 ` hs1)), (c0 `(c3[c6]hs1)), ((c0 ` c3)[c7](c0 ` hs1)), hs0 = c3)
  fvoveq1(hs0, c3, c0, c6, hs1)
  oveq1d((c0 ` hs0), c7, (c0 ` hs1), (c0 ` c3), hs0 = c3)
  fveq2(hs0, c3, c0)
  eqeq12d((c0 `(c3[c6]hs1)), ((c0 ` c3)[c7](c0 ` hs1)), (c0 `(c3[c6]c5)), ((c0 ` c3)[c7](c0 ` c5)), hs1 = c5)
  fveq2d(c0, (c3[c6]hs1), (c3[c6]c5), hs1 = c5)
  oveq2(hs1, c5, c3, c6)
  oveq2d((c0 ` c3), c7, (c0 ` hs1), (c0 ` c5), hs1 = c5)
  fveq2(hs1, c5, c0)

  ismhm(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(cplusg, c2), c3, c4)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c2))

thm mhmf1o(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmhm, c2)), wb(wf1o(c0, c3, c4), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, cmhm, c1))))

  jca(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmhm, c2)), wcel(c2, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd))
  mhmrcl2(c0, c1, c2)
  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmhm, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4)), wf(ccnv(c0), c4, c3), wral(hs0, c4, wral(hs1, c4, wceq(cfv(ccnv(c0), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(ccnv(c0), cv(hs1)))))), wceq(cfv(ccnv(c0), cfv(c0g, c2)), cfv(c0g, c1)))
  ralrimivva(hs0, hs1, c4, c4, wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmhm, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4)), wceq(cfv(ccnv(c0), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(ccnv(c0), cv(hs1)))))
  mpd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmhm, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs1), c4))), wceq(cfv(ccnv(c0), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1))), co(cfv(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(ccnv(c0), cv(hs1)))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cfv(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(ccnv(c0), cv(hs1)))), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1))))
  eqtrd(cfv(c0, co(cfv(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(ccnv(c0), cv(hs1)))), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs1)), co(cfv(c0, cfv(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0))), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(c0, cfv(ccnv(c0), cv(hs1)))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmhm, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs1), c4))))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmhm, c2)), wf1o(c0, c3, c4)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cv(hs1), c4))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cfv(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(ccnv(c0), cv(hs1)))), co(cfv(c0, cfv(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0))), cfv(cplusg, c2), cfv(c0, cfv(ccnv(c0), cv(hs1))))), wcel(c0, co(c1, cmhm, c2)), wcel(cfv(ccnv(c0), cv(hs0)), c3), wcel(cfv(ccnv(c0), cv(hs1)), c3))

  df-3an(wss(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, cmnd))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.hs0.c(c1)

  diff.hs0.c(c4)

}

thm issubm2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Mnd →(c1 ∈(SubMnd ` c0)↔(c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c1 ∧ c4 ∈ Mnd)))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(c0[|`s]c1)
} = {
  bitrd(c0 ∈ Mnd, c1 ∈(SubMnd ` c0), (c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c1 ∧ c4 ∈ Mnd), (c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c1 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)∈ c1))))
  issubm(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, (+ ` c0))

  pm5.32da(c0 ∈ Mnd, (c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c1), ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)∈ c1)), c4 ∈ Mnd)
  3expb(c0 ∈ Mnd, c1 ⊆ c2, c3 ∈ c1, (∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)∈ c1))↔ c4 ∈ Mnd))
  bicomd((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ∈ c1), ∀(hs0 ∈ c1, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1,(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)∈ c1)), c4 ∈ Mnd)

blocks.name: issubmd
blocks.content: Deduction for proving a submonoid. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Aug-2015.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm issubmd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, w1), cfv(csubmnd, c1)))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c1))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cmnd))
  -| wi(w0, w2)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c0)), wa(w3, w4))), w5)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c3), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wb(w1, w4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))), wb(w1, w5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w5)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w1)
} = {
  mpbir3and(w0, wcel(crab(s0, c0, w1), cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wss(crab(s0, c0, w1), c0), wcel(c3, crab(s0, c0, w1)), wral(s1, crab(s0, c0, w1), wral(s2, crab(s0, c0, w1), wcel(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), crab(s0, c0, w1)))))
  a1i(w0, wss(crab(s0, c0, w1), c0))
  ssrab2(s0, c0, w1)
  elrabd(s0, c3, c0, w0, w1, w2)
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, c0), wcel(c1, cmnd))
  mndidcl(c1, c3, c0)
  ralrimivva(s1, s2, crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c0, w1), w0, wcel(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), crab(s0, c0, w1)))
  sylan2b(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), crab(s0, c0, w1)), wcel(cv(s2), crab(s0, c0, w1))), wcel(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), crab(s0, c0, w1)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w3), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w4)))
  anbi12i(wcel(cv(s1), crab(s0, c0, w1)), wcel(cv(s2), crab(s0, c0, w1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w3), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w4))
  elrab(s0, cv(s1), c0, w1, w3)
  elrab(s0, cv(s2), c0, w1, w4)
  elrabd(s0, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), c0, wa(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w3), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w4))), w1, w5)
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w3), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w4))), wcel(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), c0), wcel(c1, cmnd), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c0))
  adantr(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w3), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w4)), wcel(c1, cmnd))
  simprll(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0), w3, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w4))
  simprrl(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w3), wcel(cv(s2), c0), w4)
  mndcl(c1, cv(s1), c0, cv(s2), c2)
  sylan2b(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w3), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), w4)), w5, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c0)), wa(w3, w4)))
  an4(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w3, wcel(cv(s2), c0), w4)
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(crab(s0, c0, w1), cfv(csubmnd, c1)), w3a(wss(crab(s0, c0, w1), c0), wcel(c3, crab(s0, c0, w1)), wral(s1, crab(s0, c0, w1), wral(s2, crab(s0, c0, w1), wcel(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)), crab(s0, c0, w1)))))), wcel(c1, cmnd))
  issubm(s1, s2, c1, crab(s0, c0, w1), c0, c3, c2)
  diff.crab.s(s2, s0, c0, w1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, c0, w1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: submss
blocks.content: Submonoids are subsets of the base set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: submid
blocks.content: Every monoid is trivially a submonoid of itself. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 15-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm submid(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cfv(csubmnd, c0)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
} = {
  mpbir3and(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cfv(csubmnd, c0)), wss(c1, c1), wcel(cfv(c0g, c0), c1), wcel(co(c0, cress, c1), cmnd))
  ssidd(c1, wcel(c0, cmnd))
  mndidcl(c0, cfv(c0g, c0), c1)
  eqeltrd(co(c0, cress, c1), cmnd, c0, wcel(c0, cmnd))
  ressid(c0, cmnd, c1)
  id(wcel(c0, cmnd))
  issubm2(c0, c1, c1, cfv(c0g, c0), co(c0, cress, c1))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  eqid(co(c0, cress, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm submid(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Mnd → c1 ∈(SubMnd ` c0))
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c0)
} = {
  mpbir3and(c0 ∈ Mnd, c1 ∈(SubMnd ` c0), c1 ⊆ c1, (0 ` c0)∈ c1, (c0[|`s]c1)∈ Mnd)
  ssidd(c1, c0 ∈ Mnd)
  mndidcl(c0, (0 ` c0), c1)
  eqeltrd((c0[|`s]c1), cmnd, c0, c0 ∈ Mnd)
  ressid(c0, cmnd, c1)
  id(c0 ∈ Mnd)
  issubm2(c0, c1, c1, (0 ` c0), (c0[|`s]c1))
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  eqid((c0[|`s]c1))
}

blocks.name: subm0cl

blocks.name: submcl
blocks.content: Submonoids are closed under the monoid operation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm submcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wcel(co(c2, c4, c3), c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cplusg, c1))
} = {
  3impb(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0), wcel(co(c2, c4, c3), c0))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wcel(co(c2, c4, c3), c0))
  sylan2(wa(wcel(c2, c0), wcel(c3, c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(co(c2, c4, c3), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), c0))))
  simp3d(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), c0))), wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(cfv(c0g, c1), c0))
  ibi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), w3a(wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(cfv(c0g, c1), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), c0)))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), w3a(wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(cfv(c0g, c1), c0), wral(hs0, c0, wral(hs1, c0, wcel(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), c0))))), wcel(c1, cmnd))
  submrcl(c0, c1)
  issubm(hs0, hs1, c1, c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(c0g, c1), c4)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c1))
  ovrspc2v(hs0, hs1, c2, c0, c3, c0, c4, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)

  diff.hs1.c(c1)

  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
}

thm submcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(SubMnd ` c1)∧ c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c0)→(c2[c4]c3)∈ c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(+ ` c1)
} = {
  3impb(c0 ∈(SubMnd ` c1), c2 ∈ c0, c3 ∈ c0, (c2[c4]c3)∈ c0)
  ancoms(c0 ∈(SubMnd ` c1), (c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c0), (c2[c4]c3)∈ c0)
  sylan2((c2 ∈ c0 ∧ c3 ∈ c0), c0 ∈(SubMnd ` c1), (c2[c4]c3)∈ c0, ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0[c4]hs1)∈ c0)))
  simp3d(c0 ∈(SubMnd ` c1), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0[c4]hs1)∈ c0)), c0 ⊆(Base ` c1), (0 ` c1)∈ c0)
  ibi(c0 ∈(SubMnd ` c1), (c0 ⊆(Base ` c1)∧(0 ` c1)∈ c0 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0[c4]hs1)∈ c0))))
  syl(c0 ∈(SubMnd ` c1), (c0 ∈(SubMnd ` c1)↔(c0 ⊆(Base ` c1)∧(0 ` c1)∈ c0 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, ∀(hs1 ∈ c0,(hs0[c4]hs1)∈ c0)))), c1 ∈ Mnd)
  submrcl(c0, c1)
  issubm(hs0, hs1, c1, c0, (Base ` c1), (0 ` c1), c4)
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  eqid((0 ` c1))
  ovrspc2v(hs0, hs1, c2, c0, c3, c0, c4, c0)

blocks.name: submmnd

blocks.name: subsubm
blocks.content: A submonoid of a submonoid is a submonoid. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm subsubm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3)), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wss(c2, c0))))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c1, cress, c0))
} = {
  impbida(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3)), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wss(c2, c0)))
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3))), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wss(c2, c0))
  mpbir3and(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3))), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(cfv(c0g, c1), c2), wcel(co(c1, cress, c2), cmnd))
  sstrd(c2, cfv(cbs, c1), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3)), wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  submss(c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqeltrd(cfv(c0g, c1), c2, cfv(c0g, c3), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3)), wceq(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(c0g, c3)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3)), wcel(cfv(c0g, c3), c2))
  subm0cl(c2, c3, cfv(c0g, c3))
  eqeltrrd(co(c1, cress, c2), cmnd, co(c3, cress, c2), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3))))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3)), wceq(co(c3, cress, c2), co(c1, cress, c2)), wss(c2, c0))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3)), wcel(co(c3, cress, c2), cmnd))
  submmnd(c2, c3, co(c3, cress, c2))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3))), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), w3a(wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(cfv(c0g, c1), c2), wcel(co(c1, cress, c2), cmnd))), wcel(c1, cmnd))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3)), wcel(c1, cmnd))
  submrcl(c0, c1)
  issubm2(c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(c0g, c1), co(c1, cress, c2))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  sseqtr4d(c2, c0, cfv(cbs, c3), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3)), wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  submss(c2, c3, cfv(cbs, c3))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3)), wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  mpbir3and(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wss(c2, c0))), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3)), wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(cfv(c0g, c3), c2), wcel(co(c3, cress, c2), cmnd))
  sseqtrd(c2, cfv(cbs, c3), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wss(c2, c0))))
  simprr(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wss(c2, c0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wss(c2, c0)), wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  submbas(c0, c1, c3)
  eqeltrrd(cfv(c0g, c3), c2, cfv(c0g, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wss(c2, c0))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wss(c2, c0)), wceq(cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(c0g, c3)))
  subm0(c0, c1, cfv(c0g, c1), c3)
  ad2antrl(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wss(c2, c0), wcel(cfv(c0g, c1), c2))
  subm0cl(c2, c1, cfv(c0g, c1))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c1))

  adantrl(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wss(c2, c0), wceq(co(c3, cress, c2), co(c1, cress, c2)))

  oveq1i(c3, cress, c2, co(c1, cress, c0))

  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c1)), wss(c2, c0))), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(csubmnd, c3)), w3a(wss(c2, cfv(cbs, c3)), wcel(cfv(c0g, c3), c2), wcel(co(c3, cress, c2), cmnd))), wcel(c3, cmnd))

  submbas(c0, c1, c3)
  eqeltrrd((0 ` c3), c2, (0 ` c1), (c0 ∈(SubMnd ` c1)∧(c2 ∈(SubMnd ` c1)∧ c2 ⊆ c0)))

thm 0mhm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)), wceq(c3, co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c1), c3)), wcel(c1, cmnd), wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd), wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c1)))

  eqcomd(c3, co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c1), c3), wa(wcel(c1, cmnd), wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c1))))
  mndlid(c1, c3, cfv(cbs, c1), c3, cfv(cplusg, c1))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2))), wceq(cfv(cxp(c2, csn(c3)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1))), c3), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), c2))
  adantlr(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), c2))
  3expb(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), c2))

  3eqtr4d(((c2 × { c3 })`(hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)), (((c2 × { c3 })` hs0)[(+ ` c1)]((c2 × { c3 })` hs1)), c3, (c3[(+ ` c1)]c3), ((c0 ∈ Mnd ∧ c1 ∈ Mnd)∧(hs0 ∈ c2 ∧ hs1 ∈ c2)))

  oveqan12d(((c2 × { c3 })` hs0), (+ ` c1), ((c2 × { c3 })` hs1), c3, c3, hs0 ∈ c2, hs1 ∈ c2)

  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cmhm, c2)), wcel(c3, cfv(csubmnd, c1))), wf(cres(c0, c3), cfv(cbs, c4), cfv(cbs, c2)), wf(cres(c0, c3), c3, cfv(cbs, c2)))

  anim12ci(c0 ∈(c1[MndHom]c2), c3 ∈(c4[MndHom]c1), c4 ∈ Mnd, c2 ∈ Mnd)

  syl2an(c0 ∈(c1[MndHom]c2), c3 ∈(c4[MndHom]c1), ((c0 ∘ c3):(Base ` c4)→(Base ` c2)), (c0 :(Base ` c1)→(Base ` c2)), (c3 :(Base ` c4)→(Base ` c1)))

blocks.name: mhmima
blocks.content: The homomorphic image of a submonoid is a submonoid. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Mar-2015.)

thm submacs(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Mnd →(SubMnd ` c0)∈(ACS ` c1))
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c0)
} = {
  eqeltrd((SubMnd ` c0), (ACS ` c1), { hs0 ∈ P(c1)|((0 ` c0)∈ hs0 ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ hs0, ∀(hs2 ∈ hs0,(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2)∈ hs0)))}, c0 ∈ Mnd)
  syl6eqr((SubMnd ` c0), { hs0 ∈ P(c1)|((0 ` c0)∈ hs0 ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ hs0, ∀(hs2 ∈ hs0,(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2)∈ hs0)))}, { hs0 |(hs0 ∈ P(c1)∧((0 ` c0)∈ hs0 ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ hs0, ∀(hs2 ∈ hs0,(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2)∈ hs0))))}, c0 ∈ Mnd)
  abbi2dv(hs0, (SubMnd ` c0), c0 ∈ Mnd, (hs0 ∈ P(c1)∧((0 ` c0)∈ hs0 ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ hs0, ∀(hs2 ∈ hs0,(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2)∈ hs0)))))
  syl6bbr(c0 ∈ Mnd, hs0 ∈(SubMnd ` c0), (hs0 ∈ P(c1)∧((0 ` c0)∈ hs0 ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ hs0, ∀(hs2 ∈ hs0,(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2)∈ hs0)))), (hs0 ⊆ c1 ∧(0 ` c0)∈ hs0 ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ hs0, ∀(hs2 ∈ hs0,(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2)∈ hs0))))
  issubm(hs1, hs2, c0, hs0, c1, (0 ` c0), (+ ` c0))
  bitr4i((hs0 ∈ P(c1)∧((0 ` c0)∈ hs0 ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ hs0, ∀(hs2 ∈ hs0,(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2)∈ hs0)))), (hs0 ⊆ c1 ∧(0 ` c0)∈ hs0 ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ hs0, ∀(hs2 ∈ hs0,(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2)∈ hs0))), (hs0 ⊆ c1 ∧((0 ` c0)∈ hs0 ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ hs0, ∀(hs2 ∈ hs0,(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2)∈ hs0)))))
  anbi1i(hs0 ∈ P(c1), ((0 ` c0)∈ hs0 ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ hs0, ∀(hs2 ∈ hs0,(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2)∈ hs0))), hs0 ⊆ c1)
  selpw(hs0, c1)
  3anass(hs0 ⊆ c1, (0 ` c0)∈ hs0, ∀(hs1 ∈ hs0, ∀(hs2 ∈ hs0,(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2)∈ hs0)))
  df-rab(hs0, P(c1), ((0 ` c0)∈ hs0 ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ hs0, ∀(hs2 ∈ hs0,(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2)∈ hs0))))
  syl5eqelr({ hs0 ∈ P(c1)|((0 ` c0)∈ hs0 ∧ ∀(hs1 ∈ hs0, ∀(hs2 ∈ hs0,(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2)∈ hs0)))}, (ACS ` c1), ({ hs0 ∈ P(c1)|(0 ` c0)∈ hs0 } ⋂ { hs0 ∈ P(c1)| ∀(hs1 ∈ hs0, ∀(hs2 ∈ hs0,(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2)∈ hs0))}), c0 ∈ Mnd)
  inrab(hs0, P(c1), (0 ` c0)∈ hs0, ∀(hs1 ∈ hs0, ∀(hs2 ∈ hs0,(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2)∈ hs0)))
  syl3anc(c0 ∈ Mnd, ({ hs0 ∈ P(c1)|(0 ` c0)∈ hs0 } ⋂ { hs0 ∈ P(c1)| ∀(hs1 ∈ hs0, ∀(hs2 ∈ hs0,(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2)∈ hs0))})∈(ACS ` c1), (ACS ` c1)∈(Moore ` P(c1)), { hs0 ∈ P(c1)|(0 ` c0)∈ hs0 } ∈(ACS ` c1), { hs0 ∈ P(c1)| ∀(hs1 ∈ hs0, ∀(hs2 ∈ hs0,(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2)∈ hs0))} ∈(ACS ` c1))
  mp1i(c0 ∈ Mnd, (ACS ` c1)∈(Moore ` P(c1)), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  mreacs(c1, universe)
  sylancr(c0 ∈ Mnd, { hs0 ∈ P(c1)|(0 ` c0)∈ hs0 } ∈(ACS ` c1), c1 ∈ 𝕌, (0 ` c0)∈ c1)
  mndidcl(c0, (0 ` c0), c1)
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  acsfn0(hs0, c1, universe, (0 ` c0))
  sylancr(c0 ∈ Mnd, { hs0 ∈ P(c1)| ∀(hs1 ∈ hs0, ∀(hs2 ∈ hs0,(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2)∈ hs0))} ∈(ACS ` c1), c1 ∈ 𝕌, ∀(hs1 ∈ c1, ∀(hs2 ∈ c1,(hs1[(+ ` c0)]hs2)∈ c1)))

blocks.name: mndind
blocks.content: Induction in a monoid. In this theorem, ` ps ( x ) ` is the "generic" proposition to be be proved (the first four hypotheses tell its values at y, y+z, 0, A respectively). The two induction hypotheses mndind.i1 and mndind.i2 tell that it is true at 0, that if it is true at y then it is true at y+z (provided z is in ` G ` ). The hypothesis mndind.k tells that ` G ` is generating. (Contributed by SO, 14-Jul-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm mndind(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5) {
  |- wi(w0, w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w2, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wb(w2, w4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wb(w2, w5))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wb(w2, w1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(c0g, c3))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cplusg, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cmnd))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c5, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c4, cfv(cfv(cmrc, cfv(csubmnd, c3)), c5)))
  -| wi(w0, w5)
  -| wi(wa(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c4), wcel(cv(s2), c5)), w3), w4)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w5)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w2)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w2)
  -| diffsw(s2, w3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, w1), diffsw(s0, w0))
  mpbid(w0, w1, wsbc(s0, co(c1, c0, c2), w2))
  mpd(w0, wsbc(s0, co(c1, c0, c2), w2), wsbc(s0, c1, w2))
  mpbird(w0, wsbc(s0, c1, w2), w5)
  syl(w0, wb(wsbc(s0, c1, w2), w5), wcel(c1, c4))

blocks.name: pwsco2mhm
blocks.content: Left composition with a monoid homomorphism yields a monoid homomorphism of structure powers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)
